location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区平安里西大街33号
location.en: 33 Ping'anli West Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 已撤销的中华人民共和国国务院办事机构，行政级别为正部级，协助国务院总理办理法制工作。2018年其职责并入重新组建的司法部。
description.en: A defunct agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, with ministerial-level administrative ranking, which assisted the Premier in handling legal affairs. Its functions were merged into the reorganized Ministry of Justice in 2018.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门。2018年整合了原司法部和国务院法制办公室的职责后重新组建。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. It was reorganized in 2018 by integrating the functions of the former Ministry of Justice and the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, and its highest state administrative organ.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在国务院法制办公室设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading Party group established by the Communist Party of China within the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府法制委员会

zh-cn: 中央人民政府法制委员会

description.zh-cn: 国务院法制办公室的前身机构之一，设立于1949年，负责研究、草拟与审议各种法规草案。
description.en: One of the predecessor bodies of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office, established in 1949, responsible for researching, drafting, and reviewing various draft laws and regulations.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的国家政务的最高执行机关，1954年改组为中华人民共和国国务院。
description.en: The highest executive body for state affairs in the early years of the People's Republic of China, reorganized into the State Council of the PRC in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 国务院法制办公室的前身机构之一，曾两度设立（1954-1959，1986-1998），负责国务院的法制工作。
description.en: A predecessor body of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office, which was established twice (1954-1959, 1986-1998) and was responsible for the legislative affairs of the State Council.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the 1st National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 第二届全国人大常委会

zh-cn: 第二届全国人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 第二届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the 2nd National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 国务院的办事机构。1959年国务院法制局撤销后，其业务划归秘书厅。
description.en: An administrative office of the State Council. After the State Council Bureau of Legislative Affairs was abolished in 1959, its functions were transferred to the Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场政治运动，期间国务院的法制机构于1966年底被取消。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, during which the State Council's legislative affairs body was abolished at the end of 1966.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议，会议后中国的法制建设工作得以恢复和发展，并促成了国务院法制机构的重建。
description.en: The 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP, after which the work on legal system construction in China was resumed and developed, leading to the re-establishment of the State Council's legislative affairs body.

description.zh-cn: 1980年在国务院办公室值班室第五组的基础上成立的机构，是国务院法制办公室的前身之一。
description.en: An agency established in 1980 based on the 5th group of the Duty Office of the State Council General Office, and a predecessor to the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

nodes.id: 国务院经济法规研究中心

zh-cn: 国务院经济法规研究中心

description.zh-cn: 1981年成立的国务院领导下的研究咨询机构，后与国务院办公厅法制局合并为国务院法制局。
description.en: A research and consulting body under the State Council established in 1981, later merged with the Bureau of Legislative Affairs of the General Office of the State Council to form the State Council Bureau of Legislative Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 由国务院法制局于1989年批准成立的出版社。
description.en: A publishing house approved and established by the State Council Bureau of Legislative Affairs in 1989.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的第一次会议，会议通过了关于国务院机构改革方案的决定。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress of the PRC, which passed the decision on the institutional reform plan of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 2018年由第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议批准的方案，规定重新组建司法部，不再保留国务院法制办公室。
description.en: A plan approved by the first session of the 13th National People's Congress in 2018, which stipulated the reorganization of the Ministry of Justice and the abolition of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室主任、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director and Party group member of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室党组书记、副主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary and Deputy Director of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室副主任、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director and Party group member of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室副主任、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director and Party group member of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院法制办公室副主任、党组成员。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Deputy Director and Party group member of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 国务院法制办公室是国务院办事机构。
description.en: The State Council Legislative Affairs Office was an agency directly under the State Council.

relationships.source: 中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组的上级党组织是中国共产党中央委员会。
description.en: The superior Party organization of the Party Group of the State Council Legislative Affairs Office was the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过《关于国务院机构改革方案的决定》，批准了该方案。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the Institutional Reform Plan of the State Council', approving the plan.

description.zh-cn: 《国务院机构改革方案》规定，不再保留国务院法制办公室。
description.en: The 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan' stipulated that the State Council Legislative Affairs Office would no longer be retained.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国司法部

description.zh-cn: 《国务院机构改革方案》规定，将司法部和国务院法制办公室的职责整合，重新组建司法部。
description.en: The 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan' stipulated the reorganization of the Ministry of Justice by integrating the functions of the Ministry of Justice and the State Council Legislative Affairs Office.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 经第一届全国人大常委会第二次会议批准，国务院设立国务院法制局。
description.en: With the approval of the 2nd session of the Standing Committee of the 1st National People's Congress, the State Council established the State Council Bureau of Legislative Affairs.

relationships.source: 第二届全国人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 根据第二届全国人大常委会第四次会议《关于批准国务院调整直属机构的决议》，国务院撤销国务院法制局。
description.en: According to the 'Resolution on Approving the Adjustment of Agencies Directly under the State Council' of the 4th session of the Standing Committee of the 2nd National People's Congress, the State Council abolished the Bureau of Legislative Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1966年“文革”爆发后，国务院的法制机构（当时设于国务院秘书厅内）于1966年底被取消。
description.en: After the outbreak of the 'Cultural Revolution' in 1966, the State Council's legislative affairs body (then located within the State Council Secretariat) was abolished at the end of 1966.

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届三中全会后，中国的法制建设得以恢复，于1980年5月成立了国务院办公厅法制局。
description.en: After the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CCP, China's legal system construction was resumed, and the Bureau of Legislative Affairs of the General Office of the State Council was established in May 1980.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 1986年4月，国务院决定将国务院办公厅法制局和国务院经济法规研究中心合并，成立国务院法制局。
description.en: In April 1986, the State Council decided to merge the Bureau of Legislative Affairs of the General Office of the State Council and the Economic Legislation Research Center of the State Council to establish the State Council Bureau of Legislative Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1989年7月经批准成立中国法制出版社。
description.en: In July 1989, the establishment of the China Legal Publishing House was approved.

relationships.source: 中央人民政府法制委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府法制委员会受政务院的领导。
description.en: The Legal System Committee of the Central People's Government was under the leadership of the Government Administration Council.

relationships.target: 中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
中国共产党国务院法制办公室党组
